name: df-ringc
body: |- wceq(cringc, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cfv(cestrc, cv(s0)), cresc, cres(crh, cxp(cin(cv(s0), crg), cin(cv(s0), crg))))))
comment: Definition of the category Ring, relativized to a subset ` u ` . See also the note in [Lang] p. 91, and the item Rng in [Adamek] p. 478. This is the category of all unital rings in ` u ` and homomorphisms between these rings. Generally, we will take ` u ` to be a weak universe or Grothendieck universe, because these sets have closure properties as good as the real thing. (Contributed by AV, 13-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
